title: Did Trump brag about the size of the crowd while former presidents surrounded the victims of the massacres?
subtitle: The occupied Democrat Mimi quoted four presidents precisely, but misleading readers by choosing cherry is a particularly bad moment for American President Donald Trump.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Following two mass shootings, President Donald Trump attacked a political opponent and boasted of crowd sizes during his remarks on the two incidents, while former Presidents gave words of condolence and solidarity.
